auditorium

Class Cert

  • java.lang.Object
    • auditorium.Cert

  • public class Cert
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a certificate, which is essentially a signed key. Its S-expression format is:

    (cert
     (signature signer sig-data
      (key id annotation mod exp)))

    Note that the (signature...) subexpression is the S-expression representation of a Signature; similarly, the (key...) subexpression is a Key.

    See Also:
    Signature, Key
